overview:
Business Leader, thinker and not good at sitting still for too long.

With over 15 years working within lending, credit control, debt recovery and fraud prevention, Michael brings an intimate knowledge of the industry and a passion for new technology. His 7 years immediately preceding ClearSavvy.com were spent working at debt collection agency and debt buyer, Gothia UK Ltd (formerly Red Castle Recoveries Ltd), the final 3 years of this as Managing Director. Michael’s earlier experience includes 5 years as collections manager with AFS (Automotive Financial Services Ltd) and operations manager with Thames Credit Ltd (part of the Aktiv Kapital Group).

Michael is a thought leader on the technology of debt recovery, and regularly shares his ideas about the future at BeyondTheCallCentre.com.
